entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this afternoon then periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
